panels.description: Service = ${svc}. Which is unique identifier of service

panels.description: Service among cluster. Number of routes from proxy to server
All haproxy instances in this cluster ${cls}
cls = ${cls}. Used as an unique cluster identifier and resource namespace.
panels.title: Cluster

panels.description: Role is service identifier among cluster. e.g primary, replica, standby, offline, delayed, etc....
panels.title: Role

panels.description: Number of haproxy instance among this cluster that provide service for ${svc}
panels.title: Proxy

panels.description: Number of postgres instance among this cluster that provide service ${svc}
panels.title: Server

panels.description: All postgres instance among this cluster

Service map tells whether a server can be used as a specific service/role/svc.
e.g Offline marks this server can be used as offline server
Session are created between proxies(haproxy) and servers(postgres).
panels.title: Active Session
